definitions: the flattened oval internal skeleton of the cuttlefish, which is made of white, lightweight, chalky material. It is used as a dietary supplement for caged birds and for making casts for precious metal items

examples.text: parakeets require only a cuttlebone to hone their beaks
cuttlebone has long been used for casting pieces of jewelry

shortDefinitions: flattened oval internal skeleton of cuttlefish
